code: public static void mkdirs(ZooKeeper zookeeper, String path, boolean makeLastNode, CreateMode createMode) throws Exception {     PathUtils.validatePath(path).     // skip first slash, root is guaranteed to exist     int pos = 1.     do {         pos = path.indexOf("/", pos + 1).         if (pos == -1) {             if (makeLastNode) {                 pos = path.length().             } else {                 break.             }         }         String subPath = path.substring(0, pos).         if (zookeeper.exists(subPath, false) == null) {             try {                 zookeeper.create(subPath, new byte[0], ZooDefs.Ids.OPEN_ACL_UNSAFE, createMode).             } catch (KeeperException.NodeExistsException e) {             // ignore... someone else has created it since we checked             }         }     } while (pos < path.length()). }
